column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Jake - Thanks for your feedback. I'm very sorry to hear that you felt rushed during your stay with us. Although we are a high-volume
column4: and I hope that you will accept my apology on behalf of our entire staff. When the wait list grows long in the front
column5: there's a palpable tension that can be felt among our front and back of house
column6: and we do our best not to let that negative energy seep into our service. Unfortunately
column9: but we're always striving to do better.
